name: Abyss (itch) (Xotraz)
description:
Dive into the abyss! 

You can not only jump but also move left and right.

Recolt 10 keys to advance further

How far can you go?

Done during Ludum Dare 48 on Sunday and Monday.

Generating a random and long maze with keys and doors was the fun part.

Learning Game Maker 2 was more painfull.
